desc: If you are a fan of Potato Chips then you need to show it by waving the flag of your favourite chip flavour! ChipTeams has developed unique designs to represent each of the top flavours. Team Dill Pickle, Team Ketchup, Team Salt & Vinegar, Team OG (or Original Flavour!), and Team Barbecue (Team BBQ).

layout.text: Hurry Up! Show your Love with Team Ketchup!
